meanings.definition: In a smooth and effortless manner
meanings.sent1: She danced fluidly across the stage, moving gracefully and without any effort.
meanings.sent2: The athlete moved fluidly through the obstacle course, showing great agility and ease.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved fluidly, almost as if it had a mind of its own, surprising everyone with its smooth motions.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed fluidly from her mouth, captivating the audience with their effortless delivery.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed fluidly, its waters moving smoothly and without any obstacles in its path.

meanings.sent1: The fluidly moving stream sparkled in the sunlight, showing its easy flow.

meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed fluidly from one to the next, creating a seamless and coherent presentation.

meanings.definition: Able to adapt easily and smoothly
meanings.sent1: The team worked fluidly together, adjusting to changes seamlessly and without any hiccups.
meanings.sent2: The chameleon's ability to change colors fluidly helped it blend into its surroundings effortlessly.

meanings.sent5: The actor transitioned fluidly between different roles, showcasing his versatility and adaptability.
